name: Earth X Online Quiz | Comics | 15 Questions

questions.text: What happened to the populace of the planet Earth?
options: The entire population lost its memory.
The entire population moved to another planet.
The entire population was dying from a strange plague.
questions.explanation:
The entire population was mutated.

	The population of the planet Earth was mutated and everyone had fantastic new powers.

questions.text: Who believed they were the cause of the populations change?
questions.explanation:
Reed Richards.

	Reed believed that his invention of an inexhaustable power source using Wakanda's Vibranium was the catalyst for humanity's mutation.

questions.text: Who was really the cause of the change in humanity?
questions.explanation:
Black Bolt.

	Black Bolt, the leader of the Inhumans released the Terrigan Mist into the atmosphere and changed all of humanity into super powered mutants. Bolt did this to protect his Inhuman subjects from the prejudices of the human race.

questions.text: Who did Uatu appoint as the new Watcher of the planet Earth?
questions.explanation:
X-51 (Machine Man).

	Uatu made X-51 the new Watcher, because he was now blind.

questions.text: Why did the Terrigan Mist have such a drastic affect on humans?
questions.correct: Genetic seeds planted by the Celestials
options: Genetic seeds planted by the Watchers
Humanity was an experiment by Galactus.
Combination of polutants and Terrigan Mist caused mutation.
questions.explanation:
Genetic seeds planted by the Celestials.

	The Celestials planted the seed for mutation in every human. Super heros of the past were humans who had their genetic seed germinate before everyone else. The mist germinated everyone's potential to become a super human. Those like Captain America and Spiderman were not affected by the release of the mist because they already reached their genetic potential.

questions.text: What was revealed as humanity's real purpose?
questions.correct: Humans are anti-bodies made to protect the planet from harm.
options: Humans are just the result of genetic experiments and have no purpose.
Humans are destined to rule the universe.
Humans are food for the Celestials.
questions.explanation:
Humans are anti-bodies made to protect the planet from harm.

	Humans were genetically seeded with superhuman potential by the Celestials. The seeds were planted so the human race would one day germinate and protect the infant Celestial growing inside the planet Earth.

options: Celestials reproduce asexually using a type of pollination
Celestials reproduce the same as humans
questions.explanation:
Celestial embrios grow within planets.

	Celestials use planets as a type of egg and then they usually change the dominating life on said planet into anti-bodies. Humanity was changed in order to protect the baby celestial growing in the bowels of Earth.

questions.text: What is the race of Watchers' purpose in the Universe?
questions.correct: To watch planets with Celestial Embryos
options: Their purpose is known only to them
questions.explanation:
To watch planets with Celestial Embryos.

	Watchers are lap dogs to the Celestials and are used as babysitters to make sure nothing stops the growth of the Celestial embryo. The reason Uatu gave Reed Richards the Ultimate Nullifier to drive Galactus away was not because he cared for humanity, but to protect his master's unborn child.

questions.text: What is Galactus' purpose in the Universe?
questions.correct: To keep the Celestials from overpopulating the universe.
questions.explanation:
To keep the Celestials from overpopulating the universe.

	Galactus purpose is to feed on those planets impregnated by the Celestials and killing the baby Celestial inside. That is why Earth was so tempting to him, because the celestial within was close to maturation.

questions.text: What happened when the new Red Skull was born?
questions.correct: All those with telepathic powers died.
questions.explanation:
All those with telepathic powers died.

	When the Red Skull was born, every single person with any sort of psychic powers died immediately. It was revealed that the Celestial's created him to enslave the entire population to mobilize them to be ready for any attack on the planet.

questions.text: Who punished Prince Namor for killing Human Torch?
questions.explanation:
Franklin Richards.

	The sight of his uncle being killed was too much for Franklin so he turned his awsome powers against Namor.

questions.correct: Franklin set half of Namors body on fire.
options: Namors ability to live underwater was taken away .
questions.explanation:
Franklin set half of Namors body on fire.

	As a punishment Franklin set half of the underwater kings body on fire and now Namor must live with the pain of his flesh burning for the rest of his life.

questions.text: The Asgardians are actually genetically altered humans and not gods at all?
questions.explanation:
false.

	The Asgardians are actually a formless alien race that visited Earth and were molded into thier godly forms by the beliefs of humans. As long as someone believes in them they will never die.

questions.text: Which one of the following statements concerning Reed Richards is false?
questions.correct: He caused Uatu to go blind.
options: His son Franklin is now Galactus.
He now lives in the castle of Dr. Doom.
He has given up using his stretching ability.
questions.explanation:
He caused Uatu to go blind.

	All are true except that he caused Uatu to go blind. It was revealed that Black Bolt was the one responsible for Uatus loss of sight.

questions.text: Which one of these characters didn't make an appearance in Earth X?
questions.explanation:
Nightcrawler.

	Cyclops trained a new team of X-Men. Wolverine and Jean Grey are married and don't seem too happy. Colossus is the ruler of the Russia and supplies most of the world with enough food to eat. Nightcrawler made no appearance in the series.
